body.p: An entity shall begin capitalising borrowing costs as part of the cost of a qualifying asset on the commencement date. The commencement date for capitalisation is the date when the entity first meets all of the following conditions:

li.p: it incurs expenditures for the asset;
it undertakes activities that are necessary to prepare the asset for its intended use or sale.
